name: Itineris
description: Itineris - is a casual game where you have to go through more than 50 levels of labyrinths with pleasant classical music
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i3 Memory: 100 MB RAM Graphics: Good thing it is Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: not necessary Additional Notes: Not tested by large companies
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: i7 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any which emits sounds Additional Notes: Not tested by large companies
